title: Dark
description: A mind-bending German series that explores time travel and its impact on human nature.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer navigates the drug trade and its dangers.

title: Peaky Blinders
description: A historical drama about a notorious gang in post-World War I Birmingham, England.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter navigates the outer reaches of the galaxy, protecting a mysterious child.

title: Chernobyl
description: A gripping dramatization of the catastrophic 1986 nuclear disaster and the heroes who fought to mitigate its consequences.

title: Fleabag
description: A witty and brutally honest woman navigates life and love in London while coping with personal tragedy.

title: Stranger Things
description: A thrilling series about kids in the 80s uncovering supernatural mysteries in their small town.

title: The Queen's Gambit
description: An orphaned chess prodigy struggles with addiction in a quest to become the greatest chess player in the world.

title: Black Mirror
description: An anthology series exploring the dark side of modern and future society with twisted, thought-provoking stories.

title: The Witcher
description: A fantasy series following Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, as he navigates a world full of magic and danger.

title: Money Heist
description: A gripping heist drama about a group of robbers who plan and execute the biggest heist in Spanish history.

title: Narcos
description: A dramatic portrayal of the rise and fall of notorious drug kingpin Pablo Escobar and the Medell√≠n cartel.

title: BoJack Horseman
description: An animated series about a washed-up actor who happens to be a horse, dealing with addiction, depression, and self-destructive behavior.

title: The Umbrella Academy
description: A dysfunctional family of adopted superhero siblings reunite to solve the mystery of their father's death and prevent an impending apocalypse.

title: The Crown
description: A historical drama chronicling the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

title: 13 Reasons Why
description: A high school student discovers a series of cassette tapes recorded by his deceased classmate, revealing the reasons for her suicide.

title: Lucifer
description: The Devil himself abandons Hell to run a nightclub in Los Angeles, where he becomes a consultant to the LAPD.

title: The Haunting of Hill House
description: A chilling horror series that alternates between past and present, focusing on a family dealing with haunting memories of their old home.

title: House of Cards
description: A ruthless politician will stop at nothing to conquer Washington D.C. in this political drama series.

title: Daredevil
description: Blinded as a young boy but imbued with extraordinary senses, Matt Murdock fights injustice by day as a lawyer and by night as Daredevil.

title: Bridgerton
description: A period drama set in Regency-era London, following the lives and loves of the Bridgerton family.

title: Shadow and Bone
description: In a world cleaved in two by a massive barrier of perpetual darkness, a young soldier uncovers a power that might unite her country.

title: You
description: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

title: Sex Education
description: A teenage boy with a sex therapist mother teams up with a high school classmate to set up an underground sex therapy clinic at school.

title: Tiger King
description: A true crime documentary series about the life of zookeeper Joe Exotic and the world of big cat breeding.

title: Mindhunter
description: Two FBI agents expand criminal science by delving into the psychology of murder and getting uneasily close to all-too-real monsters.

title: Big Mouth
description: An animated series following a group of teenagers, their puberty struggles, and their interactions with personified hormones.

title: Love, Death & Robots
description: An anthology series presenting animated shorts that span multiple genres, including science fiction, fantasy, horror, and comedy.
